sentences.sContent: Traditionally, the physical infrastructure providers control the underlying hardware; they provide the cloud tenant with egress and ingress at the most fundamental level.
sentences.sContent_eng: Traditionally, the physical infrastructure providers control the underlying hardware; they provide the cloud tenant with egress and ingress at the most fundamental level.
sentences.sCn: 传统上，物理设备供应商控制底层硬件； 它们提供给租户基础层上的出口和入口；

trans.tranOther: the act of leaving a building or place, or the right to do this
